message.content:
cs.LO, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.MA, cs.PL 

This paper proposes a logic for modeling asynchronous announcements in multi-agent systems, which involves dynamic modalities for making and receiving announcements. This topic is relevant to several areas in computer science, including logic (cs.LO), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), distributed computing (cs.DC), multi-agent systems (cs.MA), and public announcement logic (cs.PL). However, since the paper focuses on the formalization and axiomatization of the logic, cs.LO is the most likely sub-category. Nonetheless, the paper's relevance to other areas justifies considering cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.MA, and cs.PL as likely sub-categories as well.
